publicationPlace: Imprynted at London in Flete strete at the sygne of the Sonne
title: Here begynneth a lytell prosses or matter called the Chauc̃e of the dolorous louer newely cõpyled or made by Crystofer  Goodwyn the yere of our Lorde God, a. M.ccccc.xx.
author: Goodwin, Christopher.
notes: Imprint from colophon; date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
